thread.title: Jessica Biel Posted a Photo of Her Meal in the Shower Because Mom Life Is Hard
thread.title_full: Jessica Biel Posted a Photo of Her Meal in the Shower Because Mom Life Is Hard

author: Alessia Santoro
title: Jessica Biel Posted a Photo of Her Meal in the Shower Because Mom Life Is Hard
text:
Jessica Biel Instagram Post of Eating in the Shower Jessica Biel Posted a Photo of Her Meal in the Shower Because Mom Life Is Hard February 17, 2017 by Alessia Santoro 267 Shares A photo posted by Jessica Biel (@jessicabiel) on Sep 30, 2016 at 1:35pm PDT 
If you've ever felt that in order to get one solid second (literally) of peace away from your kids you had to retreat to the bathroom, Jessica Biel knows that feeling all too well. The mom of 1-1/2-year-old Silas took to Instagram to post a photo of an empty plate and espresso mug â€” inside her running shower. 
"Yes. I eat in the shower. I admit it," she wrote. "Chicken apple sausage and espresso. Try it. I dare you. #ShowerEats." Though some of her followers seem to be confused about her post, asking why she would ever do such a thing, all of the moms out there know that life way too well to question her tactics.
